  "description": "Hartleys Supermarket and Stores is the place of choice for a wide variety of fresh meats and produce, and other quality groceries. Here at Hartleys, we are driven by a lifelong commitment to delivering healthy food selections at affordable prices in a refreshingly clean and organized shopping environment. We remain true to our tagline, &ldquo;smiles in every aisle,&rdquo; because for us, it is personal. That&rsquo;s why we go above and beyond to offer quality products and outstanding service to the people who matter most &ndash; you, our customer.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Baking Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	The ideal candidate willsupport the creation of handcrafted breads, pastries, and confections; helping to ensure every item is made with care, consistency, and quality.
	From mixing and shaping doughs to preparing ingredients and assisting in finishing touches, you will be part of a team that transforms simple ingredients into memorable experiences for our customers.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in preparing, mixing, and shaping doughs and batters according to recipes.
	Support in the baking and finishing of breads, pastries, and cakes to maintain consistent quality.
	Measure and portion ingredients with precision to minimize waste and preserve authenticity.
	Help maintain freshness and presentation standards for all bakery products.
	Ensure a clean, organized, and food-safe work environment at all times.
	Assist with stock management of bakery ingredients and supplies.


Requirements


	SSCE, OND, or equivalent qualification (a certificate in catering, pastry, or baking is an advantage).
	0&ndash;2 years of experience in baking, pastry, or culinary arts (passion and willingness to learn are key).
	Genuine interest in artisan baking and a drive to develop professional skills.
	Strong attention to detail, creativity, and respect for traditional baking methods.
	Ability to follow recipes accurately while also contributing new ideas.
	Team player with good communication and time-management skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send a&nbsp;copy of their resume to:&nbsp;career@primera-africa.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Baking Assistant Job at Hartleys Supermarket and Stores




        
    

        
        Hartleys Supermarket and Stores is the place of choice for a wide variety of fresh meats and produce, and other quality groceries. Here at Hartleys, we are driven by a lifelong commitment to delivering healthy food selections at affordable prices in a refreshingly clean and organized shopping environment. We remain true to our tagline, “smiles in every aisle,” because for us, it is personal. That’s why we go above and beyond to offer quality products and outstanding service to the people who matter most – you, our customer.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Baking Assistant

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Description


	The ideal candidate willsupport the creation of handcrafted breads, pastries, and confections; helping to ensure every item is made with care, consistency, and quality.
	From mixing and shaping doughs to preparing ingredients and assisting in finishing touches, you will be part of a team that transforms simple ingredients into memorable experiences for our customers.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in preparing, mixing, and shaping doughs and batters according to recipes.
	Support in the baking and finishing of breads, pastries, and cakes to maintain consistent quality.
	Measure and portion ingredients with precision to minimize waste and preserve authenticity.
	Help maintain freshness and presentation standards for all bakery products.
	Ensure a clean, organized, and food-safe work environment at all times.
	Assist with stock management of bakery ingredients and supplies.


Requirements


	SSCE, OND, or equivalent qualification (a certificate in catering, pastry, or baking is an advantage).
	0–2 years of experience in baking, pastry, or culinary arts (passion and willingness to learn are key).
	Genuine interest in artisan baking and a drive to develop professional skills.
	Strong attention to detail, creativity, and respect for traditional baking methods.
	Ability to follow recipes accurately while also contributing new ideas.
	Team player with good communication and time-management skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their resume to: career@primera-africa.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

SME Marketing Officer Job at GTI Microfinance Bank




        
    

        
        GTI Microfinance Limited was incorporated in August 2007 as a limited liability company and started its operations in 2008 at No. 127 Obafemi Awolowo Road, Ikeja. In October 2013, it was licensed as a State Wide Microfinance Bank and moved its Head Office to No. 4 Tinubu Street, Central Business District, Marina Lagos. Other branches are located at Mushin, Abattoir in Agege, Surulere and Arena.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: SME Marketing Officer

Job Location: Marina, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and implement marketing strategies to attract and retain SME clients.
	Drive awareness of SME-focused loan products, savings schemes, and other financial solutions offered by the bank.
	Conduct market research to identify SME financing gaps and customer needs.
	Collaborate with the credit team to ensure smooth loan processing and monitoring for SME customers.
	Organize SME-focused promotional events, business clinics, and capacity-building sessions.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with SME clients, business associations, and local trade groups.
	Generate leads, follow up on prospects, and ensure conversion into active clients.
	Monitor competitors’ activities and market trends to recommend strategic adjustments.
	Prepare periodic marketing reports and performance reviews on SME portfolio growth.
	Meet assigned targets for client acquisition, deposit mobilization, and loan disbursement.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@gti.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
